        Global Oneword Healthcare Limited is an indigenous Pharmaceutical Company Established in June 2016. Active marketing of products started in June 2018. Global Oneword Healthcare Limited specializes in importing, marketing, selling, and distributing ONCOLOGY drugs, OTC prescription drugs as well asother things that relate to health care and health services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacist
Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	Training the Marketing and Sales Department on new drug molecules.
	Overseeing presentation of company products to healthcare staff.
	Providing guidelines to the Marketing and sales department on brand promotion.
	Responsible for registering the company premises and carryout all regulatory processes.
	Regular liaison with Health authority and advice management accordingly.
	Driving strict safety procedures in Inventory and warehouse.
	Overseeing the adherence of all safety rules regarding proper store of drugs.
	Carry out other functions that may be assigned by management.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Pharm Degree.
	Candidates must have a proven record of at least three (2) years of work experience in a similar position.
	Knowledge of MS Office, Excel and power Point
	Valid license to practice as a pharmacist.
	Excellent communication, negotiation and sales skills
	Strong organisational and time management skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: charls2000us@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Teaching Assistant (English) Job at Grundtvig International Secondary School




        
    

        
        Grundtvig International Secondary School is a multi award-winning co-educational boarding school owned by the Grundtvig Movement of Nigeria, a non-governmental organisation committed to the development of “Education for Life” in Nigeria. The Board of Trustees of the Grundtvig Movement controls the operations of the school through the principal. The Grundtvig Movement is inspired by the Danish Education-for-Life philosopher Bishop N.F.S. Grundtvig (1783-1872) and our rich tradition.

The Grundtvig International Secondary School won the 2020 Presidential Award as the Best Private Secondary School in Nigeria.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Teaching Assistant (English)

Job Location: Oba, Anambra 

Job Summary


	Grundtvig International Secondary School seeks to employ a Teaching Assistant Teachers to support teaching and learning in the school.
	He/she will work with the subject teachers to provide personalised academic support to students who require additional guidance in reading, writing, comprehension, grammar, and oral communication. This role is distinct from remedial classes and focuses on small-group and one-on-one academic support, allowing for closer interaction and improved learning outcomes.
	The position also involves assisting with classroom instruction, lesson preparation, assessments, and the development of students’ language skills.


Requirements
The ideal candidate should possess:


	A good First Degree in English Language, English Education, Linguistics or a related discipline.
	1–3 years of relevant teaching or academic support experience (teaching practice inclusive).
	Strong knowledge of the secondary school English curriculum.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Ability to explain concepts clearly and patiently to learners of varying abilities.
	Good interpersonal and classroom support skills.
	Passion for teaching, literacy development, and student growth.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application letter and CV to: info@grundtvigsecondary.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
